item.description:
Don't call Me Shirley is going to Victorian Station Vic's Boathouse, let's go listen to them

ROCK the house!

So get those dancing shoes on and dance baby dance, to an awesome band with some great friends!!!

 

This place is small, so if you don't like small places and big crowds this event may not be for you, please take that into consideration when RSVPing to this event.

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811, note this phone doesn't accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to either Donna or Janet at any event.  Thank you!

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come in and find us.
item.name: Dancing to Don't Call Me Shirley
